title: Kenneth Cole Reaction Shade Comforter Bedding Ensemble at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: Transform your bedroom into a soothing sanctuary with the Kenneth Cole Reaction Home Shade Comforter. Adorned with a beautiful botanical print upon a rich plum background, the plush bedding instantly adds a lavish look to your bed. Thanks for watching.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/kenneth-cole-reaction-home-shade-comforter-in-plum/211719?Keyword=kenneth+cole+reaction+home&view=list
Transform your bedroom into a soothing sanctuary with the Kenneth Cole Reaction Home Shade Comforter. Adorned with a beautiful botanical print upon a rich plum background, the plush bedding instantly adds a lavish look to your bed. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: The Shade comforter and bedding collection by Kenneth Cole reaction home was designed exclusively for Bed Bath and Beyond. The first layer of the bed begins with the euro shams. They add an ideal backdrop to the bed and our cotton linen blend in plum. The shade comforter and pillow shams are a botanical print on a linen cotton blend the coordinated pillow shams are finished with the same botanic motif. The resulting bed is refreshing and relaxing. The decorative pillows accenting this bed suite are a square printed gold metallic abstract Chevron pattern shimmering on a linen cotton blend, a square pillow that ombre's from purple to gray, and a rectangular pillow in plum with a gold metallic inside plate. The pillows add the key fashion elements to complete this bed look. The shade comforter and betting collection is part of the Kenneth Cole reaction home collection. It is available exclusively online and at select Bed Bath and Beyond stores.
